content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: As an exclusive offer only for you, Ms. Wang, I am willing to consider a lower rental price after an initial higher bid from another potential tenant. However, I must emphasize that my apartment is highly sought after due to its prime location in the city center. Let's begin with a rental price of 1250 Euros per month. Now, I'm eager to hear your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing this initial price, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering my tight budget as a student and the various affordable options available in the area, I find it difficult to accept your proposed rent of 1250 Euros. I would like to suggest a more reasonable price range around 900-1000 Euros per month, with the understanding that this apartment offers excellent facilities in a prime location. If this price adjustment doesn't work for you, I understand and will continue my search elsewhere. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this counteroffer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: I appreciate your honesty regarding your budget constraints as a student, but let me make it clear that this apartment is not only located in the city center but also offers a spacious and high-quality living space. I have already reduced my expectations due to a competing offer, but I am reluctant to lower the rent significantly further. With deep regret, I must stick with the initial price of 1250 Euros per month. I apologize if this doesn't align with your financial situation, but I hope you understand my position. TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
